Plot: Mark and Dave Schultz, U.S. Olympic Wrestling champions, join Team Foxcatcher led by multimillionaire John E. du Pont as they train for the 1988 games in Seoul - but John's emotional self-destruction threatens to consume them all.
Title: Foxcatcher
Actors: Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo, Sienna Miller
tomatoConsensus: A chilling true crime drama, Foxcatcher offers Steve Carell, Mark Ruffalo, and Channing Tatum a chance to shine -- and all three of them rise to the challenge.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 71 nominations.
